message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.

Alice, thanks for the offer, but $1200000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay $800000. This is my final offer, as I have another option to buy at this price.

I understand you have another option at $800000, but I'm willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial price. I can offer you a compromise at $950000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $950000 is still too high for me. I'm firm on my offer of $800000. If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to move forward with my other option.
